partial_orders.reason: These edits are moving the same documentation block (location_ parameter description) from one location to another within the same docstring. Edit 0 removes the location_ documentation from lines 84-86, and edit 1 adds the exact same documentation at lines 87-89. This is a cut-and-paste move operation where the removal must occur before the relocation to avoid duplication. The second edit cannot be properly staged until the first edit removes the original content.

Both edits perform identical textual substitution - removing the same 3 lines of documentation about 'location_' parameter from docstrings in different classes within the same file. This is a uniform bulk edit pattern where the same before→after change (removing identical documentation lines) is applied to the same type of syntactic construct (class docstrings) as part of a single refactoring operation.
